text: "Watching the Wheels" is a 1981 song by John Lennon and is the third and final single from his 1980 album Double Fantasy. It went to number 10 in the United States, number 3 in Canada, number 6 in Switzerland and number 30 in the United Kingdom. Category:1981 songs Category:John Lennon songs Category:Chris Cornell songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Watching the Wheels
